tool_description:
Make RSS feed from any page using css paths to feed elements.
Use Firebug "Copy CSS path" feature to copy path, Firefinder for Firebug to debug and highlight matches.
name: RSS from any page
title: RSS from any page

api_list.name: /feed/

required_parameters.name: details_page_text_css_path
required_parameters.description: Css path to text on details page

required_parameters.name: index_url
required_parameters.description: Index page url - page with new feed elements
